patterns: What is the address of your shop?
Can you give me your address?
responses: Our address is Shop-425, 426, 427, Level-4, 3rd Floor Alpana Plaza, 51 New Elephant Road, Dhaka, Bangladesh

patterns: can I get the product by Home Delivery ?
do you guys have home delivery facilities?
responses: Yes, you can get the product through our home delivery service, but it costs extra 300 taka

patterns: do I get any warranty with the TV?
responses: Yes, all our products have 2 Years Service warranty

patterns: are you currently giving any discount?
responses: At the moment, we are not giving any amount of discount on  any of our products

patterns: does the tv come with any stand?
responses: No, but you can buy a TV stand or a wall-mounting bracket for 1500 taka

patterns: how do i buy a product?
I want to place an order
responses: You can chat with me for product information. But for placing order you must call our shop at 01752509890

patterns: how can i return a product?
What if I don't like the product?
What if there is a defect?
responses: We are extremely sorry, but we do not have any option for return, refund or exchange of our any product once delivered. So it is recommended to check your product properly while taking the delivery. If the defect is covered by warranty we will change it

patterns: do you ship outside of dhaka?
Can you send the product outside Dhaka?
responses: We do not delivery outside of Dhaka by ourselves. But we can sent any product via courier service any where in Bangladesh. In that case, customer is liable for carrying charge and liability

patterns: how much for shipping outside of dhaka
what is the charge for shipping outside of dhaka
responses: Minimum 5000 taka advance payment is required for an order from outside of Dhaka but shipping charge is as per courier service you want to take

patterns: how long will it take to get my product?
How much time it will take you to deliver
How much time is required for delivery
Tell me about the time required for delivery
responses: It usually takes around 48 hours to transport the product from our warehouse. Upon arrival of the product, we will immediately contact you via you provided contact number during order placement
